summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Level System Bug Fix and Performance Optimizations. All 3 high-priority issues have been successfully fixed and verified.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Occasional session token parsing issue during heavy load
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Session token capture working in 96% of cases

passed_tests: Level System Bug Fix: Admin gift-points endpoint correctly recalculates levels
Level System Bug Fix: /api/auth/me returns correct level matching points thresholds
Level System Bug Fix: Level sync verified - 200pts gifted correctly updated level from 5 to higher
Backend Performance: Matches endpoint responds in 0.08s (excellent)
Popular Tab: Shows matches sorted by prediction count (Top 10 most predicted)
Top Live Tab: Shows 2 live matches with proper header
Soon Tab: Shows 29 upcoming matches within 3 days
Ended Tab: Loads finished matches with caching
Match Card Functionality: All vote buttons and GUESS IT buttons present and functional
League Filter Performance: Filter switching within 1.2s
Health Check: API healthy and responsive
Admin Authentication: Login working with correct role verification
Gift Points API: Successfully gifts points and auto-calculates levels
